meanings.definition: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness.
meanings.sent1: The children's faces lit up with joys when they saw the colorful balloons.
meanings.sent2: She always finds joys in spending time with her family.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics brought endless joys to the family.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, we must seek out the hidden joys among the thorns.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes sparkled with the memories of past joys.

meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: He joys in playing his favorite musical instrument every evening.
meanings.sent2: She joys in exploring new places and trying different foods.
meanings.sent3: The cat joyed in chasing after the elusive red laser dot.
meanings.sent4: Like a bee to nectar, she joys in the sweet taste of success.
meanings.sent5: The artist joys in creating beautiful paintings that touch people's hearts.

meanings.sent1: They joys at the news of their friend's safe return.
meanings.sent2: She joys every time she sees a rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The students joyed when they found out that the test was canceled.
meanings.sent4: The flowers joyed in the warmth of the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The community joys in coming together to celebrate special occasions.
